document_data.caption: A map of Callidyrr showing Holyhead on the east coast.
document_data.name: Holyhead
document_data.mainbody: '''Holyhead''' was a small coastal village located in the kingdom of [[Callidyrr]] on the island of [[Alaron]] within the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles}}
document_data.Geography: Holyhead was found in northern Callidyrr in the county of [[Stagford]] on Alaron's eastern coast with the [[Sea of Moonshae]]. The village sate just west of the ominous [[Dernall Forest]] and north of the [[Drowned Forest]].
